verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Who should go up <S%H5927><s%> for us first <S%H8462><s%> against the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> to fight against them? <S%H3898><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall go up. <S%H5927><s%> Behold, <S%H5414><s%> I have delivered the land <S%H776><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> with me into my lot, <S%H1486><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites; <S%H3669><s%> and I likewise will go <S%H1980><s%> with you into your lot. <S%H1486><s%>" So Simeon <S%H8095><s%> went with him. <S%H3212><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> went up; <S%H5927><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> into their hand: <S%H3027><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> of them in Bezek <S%H966><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

They found <S%H4672><s%> Adoni-Bezek <S%H137><s%> in Bezek; <S%H966><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against him, <S%H5221><s%> and they struck the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites. <S%H6522><s%>

But Adoni-Bezek <S%H137><s%> fled; <S%H5127><s%> and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H270><s%> and caught him, <S%H7112><s%> and cut off his thumbs <S%H931><s%> and his great toes. <S%H7272><s%>

Adoni-Bezek <S%H137><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Seventy <S%H7657><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> having their thumbs <S%H931><s%> and their great toes <S%H7272><s%> cut off, <S%H7112><s%> scavenged <S%H3950><s%> under my table: <S%H7979><s%> as I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so God <S%H430><s%> has requited <S%H7999><s%> me. <S%H935><s%>" They brought him to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and he died there. <S%H4191><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H5221><s%> and struck it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and set <S%H7971><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H5045><s%> and in the South, and in the lowland. <S%H8219><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath Arba <S%H7153><s%>); and they struck <S%H5221><s%> Sheshai, <S%H8344><s%> and Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> and Talmai. <S%H8526><s%>

From there he went <S%H3212><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir. <S%H1688><s%> (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath Sepher. <S%H7158><s%>)

Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "He who strikes <S%H5221><s%> Kiriath Sepher, <S%H7158><s%> and takes <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H5414><s%> to him will I give Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>"

Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s younger <S%H6996><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> it: <S%H5414><s%> and he gave him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>

It happened, <S%H935><s%> when she came, that she got <S%H5496><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> for a field: <S%H7704><s%> and she alighted <S%H6795><s%> from off her donkey; <S%H2543><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said to her, <S%H559><s%> "What would you like?"

She said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3051><s%> "Give me a blessing; <S%H1293><s%> for that you have set <S%H5414><s%> me in the land <S%H776><s%> of the South, <S%H5045><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>" Then Caleb <S%H3612><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the lower <S%H8482><s%> springs. <S%H1543><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of the Kenite, <S%H7017><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>' brother-in <S%H2859><s%>-law, went up <S%H5927><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm trees <S%H8558><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which is in the south <S%H5045><s%> of Arad; <S%H6166><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Zephath, <S%H6857><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it. <S%H8034><s%> The name of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

Also Judah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with its border, <S%H1366><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> with its border, <S%H1366><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> with its border. <S%H1366><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and drove out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country; <S%H3808><s%> for he could not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%> because they had chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> to Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had spoken: <S%H1696><s%> and he drove <S%H3423><s%> out there the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak. <S%H6061><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> did not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> who inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> but the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
The house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> they also went up <S%H5927><s%> against Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and Yahweh was with them. <S%H3068><s%>
The house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> sent to spy <S%H8446><s%> out Bethel. <S%H1008><s%> (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Luz. <S%H3870><s%>)

The watchers <S%H8104><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and they said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7200><s%> "Please show us the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> and we will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly with you. <S%H2617><s%>"

He showed <S%H7200><s%> them the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city; <S%H5892><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> but they let the man <S%H376><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> and all his family. <S%H4940><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> its name <S%H8034><s%> Luz, <S%H3870><s%> which is its name <S%H8034><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> did not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of Beth Shean <S%H1052><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its towns; <S%H1323><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that land. <S%H776><s%>

It happened, <S%H3478><s%> when Israel had grown strong, <S%H2388><s%> that they put <S%H7760><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to forced labor, <S%H4522><s%> and did not utterly <S%H3423><s%> drive them out. <S%H3423><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%> among them. <S%H7130><s%>

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Kitron, <S%H7003><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Nahalol; <S%H5096><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them, <S%H4522><s%> and became subject to forced labor.

Asher <S%H836><s%> didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Acco, <S%H5910><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> nor of Ahlab, <S%H303><s%> nor of Achzib, <S%H392><s%> nor of Helbah, <S%H2462><s%> nor of Aphik, <S%H663><s%> nor of Rehob; <S%H7340><s%>

but the Asherites <S%H843><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> for they did not drive them out. <S%H3423><s%>

Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth Shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth Anath; <S%H1043><s%> but he lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> nevertheless the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth Shemesh <S%H1053><s%> and of Beth Anath <S%H1043><s%> became subject to forced labor. <S%H4522><s%>

The Amorites <S%H567><s%> forced <S%H3905><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%> country; <S%H5414><s%> for they would not allow them to come down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley; <S%H6010><s%>

but the Amorites <S%H567><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Heres, <S%H2776><s%> in Aijalon, <S%H357><s%> and in Shaalbim: <S%H8169><s%> yet the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> prevailed, <S%H3513><s%> so that they became subject to forced labor. <S%H4522><s%>
The border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> was from the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H4610><s%> from the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>
